#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
inline void inp( int &n )
{
   n=0;
   int ch=getcx();int sign=1;
   while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getcx();}
 
   while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
           n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
   n=n*sign;
}

int main()
{
    int t,i,j=0;
    char str[100001];
    inp(t);
    while(t--)
    {
    j=0;
       scanf("%s",str);
       for(i=0;i<strlen(str)&&j>=0;i++)
       {
                                       if(str[i]=='T')
                                       j++;
                                       else
                                       j--;
       }       
       if(j==0)
       printf("YES\n");
       else 
       printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
